title: Fallen Timbers Battlefield and Fort Miamis National Historical Site Act
content: Fallen Timbers Battlefield and Fort Miamis National Historical Site Act - Establishes the Fallen Timbers Battlefield and Fort Miamis National Historical Site in Ohio. Authorizes the Governor of Ohio to designate, from a specified list of candidates, a management entity which shall draw up a management plan for approval by the Secretary of the Interior. Prohibits the Secretary or any other Federal agency from making a limitation on fishing, hunting, or trapping a condition of the determination of eligibility for, or receipt of, assistance under this Act.
